mediaspoiler-pref-help:
Help message for media display option.

See [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:MediaSpoiler MediaSpoiler] for more information
mediaspoiler-pref-hidemarked: Option for users who want to hide media marked as sensitive.
mediaspoiler-pref-showall: Option for users who want to show all media.
mediaspoiler-pref-hideall: Option for users who want to hide all media.
mediaspoiler-pref-noimg: Option for users who want to show links to media description pages only.
